long_description: The Shimano XTR M985 SPD pedals give you the best of both worlds-lightweight, high-quality SPD pedals combined with large pedal platforms, giving you more confidence in rough terrain. Dual-sided entry with robust retention claws offer easy entry and exit. New low-profile integrated pedal cage design increases pedal to shoe contact over 200% from previous non-caged designs. Improved cleat interface increases pedaling stability; adjustable release tension allows for individual customization based on rider preference. Open binding mechanism is designed to shed mud. The Shimano XTR M985 SPD pedals have strong chromoly spindles that deliver exceptional durability and precise feedback to your feet.
short_description: The Shimano XTR M985 SPD pedals give you the best of both worlds-lightweight, high-quality SPD pedals combined with large pedal platforms, giving you more confidence in rough terrain.
